product_name: GarnierSkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water with Vitamin C
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGarnier SkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water, with Vitamin C cleanses skin, removes makeup, and boosts glow in 1 step.
details: DetailsBenefitsLifts away dirt, makeup and excess oil in just a few swipesAMERICA'S NUMBER 1 MICELLAR WATERLike a magnet, micelles capture and lift away dirt, oil and makeup without harsh rubbingCruelty FreeFormulated WithoutFragranceOilsParabensSulfatesItem 2570035How To UsePour onto cotton pad until fully saturated. Gently wipe pad across face to cleanse and remove face makeup. To remove eye makeup, hold pad over closed eyelids for a few seconds, then gently wipe away. Use daily. No need to rinse. Try with reusable Garnier Micellar Eco Pads.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.IngredientsAqua / Water, Hexylene Glycol, Glycerin, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Bht, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Disodium Edta, Myrtrimonium Bromide, Poloxamer 184.
how_to_use: Pour onto cotton pad until fully saturated. Gently wipe pad across face to cleanse and remove face makeup. To remove eye makeup, hold pad over closed eyelids for a few seconds, then gently wipe away. Use daily. No need to rinse. Try with reusable Garnier Micellar Eco Pads.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I use this product as a toner because of the Vitamin C in it. Normally, anything with Vitamin C will irritate my skin causing small welt like areas on my face. No reaction! I like how soft and cleaner my face felt too. Moisturizer went on even better. Purchased smallest bottle first and I highly recommend trying it too.

reviews.headline: "No rubbing" Lies
reviews.comments: This makeup remover did not remove my waterproof mascara. It says no rubbing on the bottle; this is far from the truth. I followed the instructions: saturate, press, then wipe. It took me rubbing my lashes for 30 seconds to even see a speck of the mascara being removed.

reviews.headline: Love. Buy it again and again 5‚òÜ
reviews.comments: Awesome and great. I've been using it for years

reviews.headline: Only Makeup Removal Product I Use!
reviews.comments: I love taking my makeup off with this stuff. Although you want to wash your face after makeup removal, sometimes I'm guilty of not doing so and this product leaves you with a nice health glow! I've already purchased my back up bottle lol

reviews.headline: Burn
reviews.comments: The product works but it burn my skin and I don't even have sensitive skin. So I have tried all of them by this company and all of them burn my face. I don't know what it is.

reviews.headline: I swear by Garnier micellar waters
reviews.comments: I feel like you cannot go wrong with Garnier's micellar water range. Tried this particular one for the first time, and it leaves no residue after removing your makeup, and it definitely didn't dull the skin. It's gentle and works for my waterproof makeup too.

reviews.headline: Amazing makeup remover
reviews.comments: This is definitely a repurchase for me. This is my first step in my cleaning routine and it works very well for me.

reviews.headline: I like micellar water
reviews.comments: I've been using micellar water for a while and I like it removes makeup well

reviews.headline: Found a new makeup & eye makeup remover!
reviews.comments: Couldn't believe it's gentle and works so well, didn't have to scrub so hard over my eyes.

reviews.headline: i would buy again
reviews.comments: i use this daily and love it makes taking my make up off very easy

reviews.headline: Garnier skin active Micellar cleansing water with vitamin c
reviews.comments: I love this stuff. Will buy it again.

reviews.headline: My go to cleanser
reviews.comments: It's light and not harsh when removing makeup.

reviews.headline: Vit C cleanser
reviews.comments: This really does do the job. I have not and will not use to remove my eye make up but this goes through my moisturizer, primer, foundation & setting spray easily. I just soak a cotton ball. Smell & consistency is fine but I did feel like it leaves a tacky film so I do need to rinse off-1 star. I have used this nightly for 4 weeks and do not really see any vit c benefits so I will buy again just a different formula like HA.  Also like they are cruelty free.

reviews.headline: Meh - Ulta Rep said it works great as makeup remover üëéüèΩ
reviews.comments: This is just another process after using make-up remover, soap and water and then this??? No thank you, more processes not needed. Was told it was a make-up remover which it is not.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: Impressive to say the least, absolutely love this product, takes off the day or night with no residual effects. Super easy to use, no burning the eyes or skin. I will be using this product always.

reviews.headline: This makeup remover is awesome for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: Alot of makeup removers are always harsh or too oily, but this is the one fr! It's not too strong and it does it's job. 10/10

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: Cleared all my makeup off in 1 minutes. It was super moisturizing and brightening

reviews.headline: this is the only makeup remover i will ever use
reviews.comments: it's not oily AT ALL (they usually are) and it doesn't leave your face feeling wet you can't even tell you just used it! i love it so so much

reviews.headline: YES YES YES!
reviews.comments: I absolutely recommend this to everyone!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product
reviews.comments: Very good product

media.headline: Another great product from Garnier
media.caption: Easy to incorporate into your skin care routine

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received Garnier Skinactive Micellar Cleansing Water through Pinchme complimentary for my honest review. 
The one I received is an all-in- 1 brightener with vitamin C for dull sensitive skin. Which is perfect as my face is combination, but mainly oily in summer and I can at times get dry patches sporadically in summer & winter in random areas of my face. 

I love that this product has no drying agents such as alcohol, no fragrances in case you are sensitive to scents( big benefit, because I'm pregnant - smells can be off-putting at this time), or any added oils to increase grease production on your face.. 
After using this product for about 2 weeks I did notice it would pick up grime even if I washed my face with only warm water to test out how effective it is. So far I'm impressed that it still had the ability to pick up some grime. I haven't noticed any skin brightening yet. I may still have premature results being 2 weeks and that's not everyday use( every other day, but multi time a day usage). 

My only drawback for me is it doesn't hydrate, even though it states it's a non drying formula. At times I'm on autopilot or living a rushed hectic lifestyle keeping up with my toddler that I actually forget to apply moisturizer after I use it. Which led me to drying out a bit on my cheeks from washing my face with warm water. This is only due to my previous routine where most of my products I use have some hydrating benefits. So it's really a matter of making a mental note to add some type moisturizer after use. 
Anyway, I did notice and thought it was a nice kicker that the bottle is made of 30% recycle plastic. It's nice they are taking into account the environment with there products. 
Really nice product, I'm willing to try their other Micellar waters to see if I can find the perfect fit for me. Highly recommend this one for those really looking to avoid additional hydration.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great cleansing Water

faceoff_negative.comments: I'm someone that uses Micellar Water every day, twice daily (morning & night) before washing my face to help remove sunscreen, pollution, grime, make-up, etc so I've tried many, many brands & I know what I like. Garnier SkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water with Vitamin C not only does what it's supposed to do by gently cleansing but it goes above & beyond by also brightening the skin. I really appreciate the fact that this micellar water does not leave my skin feeling sticky or irritated, which has happened with a few others cleansing waters I've tried in the past. Garnier SkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water with Vitamin C is gentle enough to be used multiple times a day while being effective enough to sufficiently cleanse the skin without any irritation. Highly recommended!
faceoff_negative.headline: Amazing!
